biotools.summary: Software to detect significantly under- or over-represented groups of homologous genes (KO groups) in one taxon (named test taxon) when compared with another (named background taxon) in a given biochemical pathway.

bioschemas.name: KOMODO
bioschemas.summary: Software to detect significantly under- or over-represented groups of homologous genes (KO groups) in one taxon (named test taxon) when compared with another (named background taxon) in a given biochemical pathway.
